channel.title: Statistics on Statistical Issues
channel.description: Recent content in Statistics on Statistical Issues

item.title: Markdown test
item.description: Welcome! This a documentation web about statistical theory, modelling and implimentation. We try to cover brief theory about models being used as well as implementations on some programming languages like R and Python. Theme Material is a theme for Hugo, a fast and flexible static site generator. It is built using Google’s material design guidelines, fully responsive, optimized for touch and pointer devices as well as all sorts of screen sizes.

item.title: Concepts of Statistics and Probabilitieds
item.description: Welcome! This a documentation web about statistical theory, modelling and implimentation. We try to cover brief theory about models being used as well as implementations on some programming languages like R and Python. Theme Material is a theme for Hugo, a fast and flexible static site generator. It is built using Google’s material design guidelines, fully responsive, optimized for touch and pointer devices as well as all sorts of screen sizes.
